meanings.sent1: She was stupendously happy when she received her birthday present.
meanings.sent2: The rocket ship traveled stupendously fast through space.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a stupendously large rabbit out of his hat.
meanings.sent4: The mountain rose stupendously high into the sky, touching the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks display was stupendously colorful and bright, lighting up the night sky.

meanings.sent1: The magician performed a stupendously impressive trick that left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent2: The view from the top of the mountain was stupendously beautiful.
meanings.sent3: The cake was stupendously delicious, disappearing within minutes.
meanings.sent4: Her talent for painting was stupendously unique, capturing the essence of each scene.
meanings.sent5: The roller coaster ride was stupendously thrilling, with twists and turns that kept everyone on the edge of their seats.
